enWisdom: The fool does not improve by being disgraced

Wisdom: الْأَحْمَقُ لَا يَحْسُنُ [يحسن‏] بِالْهَوَانِ وَلَا يَنْفَكُّ عَنْ نَقْصٍ وَخُسْرَانٍ
enWisdom: A fool does not improve by abasement and he is does not separate from fault and loss
Foolishness is occupying oneself with the superfluous and accompanying the ignorant

Wisdom: تُعْرَفُ حَمَاقَةُ الرَّجُلِ بِالْأَشِرِ فِي النِّعْمَةِ وَكَثْرَةِ الذُّلِّ فِي الْمِحْنَةِ
enWisdom: The foolishness of a person is recognized by [his] cheerfulness in times of blessing and increased abjectness in times of tribulation

Wisdom: تُعْرَفُ حَمَاقَةُ الرَّجُلِ فِي ثَلَاثٍ فِي كَلَامِهِ فِيمَا لَا يَعْنِيهِ وَجَوَابِهِ عَمَّا لَا يُسْأَلُ عَنْهُ وَتَهَوُّرِهِ فِي الْأُمُورِ
enWisdom: The foolishness of a person is recognized in three things: in his talking about that which does not concern him, [in] his answering that which he was not asked and his recklessness in [his] affairs
For the fool there is an oath with every statement
One who uses obscene language is reviled

Wisdom: مَنْ أَنْكَرَ عُيُوبَ النَّاسِ وَرَضِيَهَا لِنَفْسِهِ فَذَلِكَ الْأَحْمَقُ
enWisdom: Whoever disapproves of the faults of people but accepts them in himself, then that is a fool
Being audacious in front of the king is an act of foolishness

Wisdom: مِنْ دَلَائِلِ الْحُمْقِ دَالَّةٌ بِغَيْرِ آلَةٍ وَصَلَفٌ بِغَيْرِ شَرَفٍ
enWisdom: From the signs of foolishness are: being audacious without any means and boasting without [possessing] any nobility
Being audacious in front of the king is an act of foolishness
Increased fickleness is from the signs of a fool
Dimwittedness is the key to ridicule

Wisdom: الْخُرْقُ مُعَادَاةُ الْآرَاءِ [مُنَاوَاةُ الْأُمَرَاءِ] وَمُعَادَاةُ مَنْ يَقْدِرُ عَلَى الضَّرَّاءِ
enWisdom: Ineptness is opposing [others’] views and having enmity with one who is capable of causing harm
In impudence and excessive joking there is foolishness

Wisdom: مَنْ أَزْرَى عَلَى غَيْرِهِ بِمَا يَأْتِيهِ فَذَلِكَ الْأَخْرَقُ
enWisdom: One who belittles others for that which he himself does, then that is an imbecile
